import React from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import { v4 as uuidv4 } from 'uuid'; export default function TableForm({description, setDescription , rate , setRate,quantity, setQuantity, amount ,setAmount,file, setFile,handleChange, list, setList}) { const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const newItems = { id :uuidv4(), description, file, rate, quantity, amount, } setDescription("") setFile() setQuantity("") setRate("") setAmount("") setList([...list, newItems]) console.log(list) } useEffect( ()=> { const calculateAmount = (amount) => { setAmount (quantity * rate) } calculateAmount(amount) }, [amount, rate, quantity, setAmount]) const deleteRow = ((id)=>{ setList(list.filter((row) => row.id !=id)) }) return ( <>
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setRate(e.target.value)} />
setQuantity(e.target.value)} />

{amount}

) }
